text: aur apne taqt par apne maa baap ko ooncha bhitaya aur sub us ke saamne sajde mein gir gaye, tab kaha ke abba ji! ye mere pehle ke qwaab ki tabeer hai, mere rub ne ise saccha kar dikhaya, us ne mere saath bada ehsaan kiya, jab ke mujhe jail khaane se nikala aur aap logo ko sehraa se le aya, us eqtelaaf ke baadh jo shaitaan ne mujh mein aur mere bhaiyyo mein daal diya tha, mera rub jo chaahe us ke liye behetreen tadhbeer karne wala hai aur wo bahuth ilm wa hikmath wala hai
